title: Ruby!
author: JGray
text:
Hidden Name: Loni

As requested, here's information on Ruby!

Ruby's first appearance.

Ruby foreshadows the current heist.

Theresa, William and Chrys discuss Ruby, part 1.

Theresa, William and Chrys discuss Ruby, part 2.

Baron Sir issuing a command to Ruby.

I hope that helps y'all remember who she is. Down the road, I think I want to do a side story with her. She's an interesting character and her interactions with the Inn residents before this heist began would have been interesting to see.

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: I wonder if Theresa used her power for that shot or just the fact that a Humanoid body would have to have the same structural weaknesses as a Human.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: That's gonna leave a mark.

replies.author: Tzivya*Guest*
replies.text: Wait, her shooting something actually worked for once?
